page.title: 10Meadowside Leisure Centre
page.content: The Leisure Centre is built on the banks of the River Trent. It contains a large swimming pool and a smaller teaching pool. There are other activities that you can take part in such as squash and badminton. There are also some sun-beds and a sauna. When you have finished swimming you can go to the cafe if you want anything to eat. They also have a bar for the grown-ups and they sometimes have discos. If you go in the car to the leisure centre there are two car parks. The leisure centre is a good place to go to.
